# klaetia
colonial_klaetia = {
	color = { 69 157 208 }

	provinces = {
		1843 1844 1845 1846 1847 1848 1849 1850 1851 1852 1853 1854 1855 1856 1857 1858 1859 1860 1869 1868 1870 1871 1872 1924 1925 1926 1929 1930 1931 1932 1933 1934 1935 1936 1937 1938 1939 1940 1941 1942 1943 1944 1945 1946 1947 1948 #1873 1874
		3376 3377 3378 3379 3380 3381 3382 3383 3384 3385 3386 3387 3388 3389 3390 3391 3392 3393 3394 3395 3396 3397 3398 3399 3400 3401 3402 3403 3404 3405 3406 3407 3408 3409 3410 121 156
		1861 1862 1863 1864 1865 1880 1881 1879 1866 1867 1876 1875 1877 1878 1874 1873
		3649 3650 3651 3652 3653 3654 3655 1882 461
		1949 1950 1951 1992 3656 3657 3658 3664 3665 3666 3667
		5333 5334 5335 5336 2964 2965 2966 2967 1993 2000
		3413 3414 3415 3416 3417 3418 3419 3423 3424 3425 3426 3411 3412
	}
	
	# established colonies
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = SAL
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_KLAETIA_Sringar"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = ATH
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_KLAETIA_Silobo"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = LEL
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_KLAETIA_Oagemins"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = KAF
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_KLAETIA_Cloudham"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = NYH
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_TERMINA_Laslesia"
	}
	#generic
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_REGION_New_Root_GetName"
	}
}
